duties_responsibilities.duty: Prospect for new clients and referral sources through telephone, direct mail, and local marketing programs.
Conduct meetings with new prospects through telephone calls, targeted email campaigns, and corporate marketing programs.
Present payroll products and services to decision makers and end users within the prospect universe.
Analyze customer needs and interests to determine appropriate products and services.
Maintain a comprehensive understanding of the product offering to optimize sales results and remain up-to-date with industry trends.
Expedite the resolution of customer problems or complaints to ensure client satisfaction.
